species.name: shiinotic
descriptions: Forests where Shiinotic live are treacherous to enter at night. People confused by its strange lights can never find their way home again.
If you see a light deep in a forest at night, don’t go near. Shiinotic will make you fall fast asleep.
It emits flickering spores that cause drowsiness. When its prey succumb to sleep, this Pokémon feeds on them by sucking in their energy.
It puts its prey to sleep and siphons off their vitality through the tip of its arms. If one of its kind is weakened, it helps by sending it vitality.
Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing, it drains their vitality with its fingertips.

abilities.name: effect-spore
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of inflcting either paralysis, poison, or sleep on attacking Pokémon on contact.

abilities.name: rain-dish
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.
